headline: CenterPoint CEO on $65B Plan to Meet Electric Demand
summary: Jason Wells, CenterPoint Energy CEO, says the company took 100 years to build its system and "may double it" in the next five to 10 years, largely driven by data centers. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on "The Close."

raw.headline: CenterPoint CEO on $65B Plan to Meet Electric Demand

headline: CenterPoint Unveils a $65 Billion Decade-Long Investment Plan
summary: CenterPoint boosts long-term capital spending and raises earnings guidance amid surging Texas demand.
